traits.locale_text: Вы до применения карательных мер одним словом убедили СПО мятежной планеты перейти на сторону арбитров

languages.text: Вы одним словом убедили повстанцев с мятежной планеты перейти на сторону арбитров, даже не прибегнув при этом к карательным мерам.
Your words alone persuaded a group of rebels to join the Arbitrators' side in the midst of a planet-wide uprising, without any need for punitive measures.
languages.original_text: Вы одним словом убедили повстанцев с мятежной планеты перейти на сторону арбитров, даже не прибегнув при этом к карательным мерам.

traits.locale_text: Your words alone persuaded a group of rebels to join the Arbitrators' side in the middle of a planet-wide uprising before you even had to resort to punitive measures.
Your words alone persuaded a group of rebels to join the Arbitrators' side in the middle of a planet-wide uprising before you even had to resort to punitive measures.
Your words alone persuaded a group of rebels to join the Arbitrators' side in the midst of a planet-wide uprising, without any need for punitive measures.
Your words alone persuaded a group of rebels to join the Arbitrators' side in the midst of a planet-wide uprising, without any need for punitive measures.
Your words alone persuaded a group of rebels to join the Arbitrators' side in the midst of a planet-wide uprising, without any need for punitive measures.
Your words alone persuaded a group of rebels to join the Arbitrators' side in the midst of a planet-wide uprising, without any need for punitive measures.

languages.text: Deine Worte allein haben einige Rebellen dazu bewogen, sich während eines planetenweiten Aufstandes ohne Strafmaßnahmen auf die Seite der Arbitratoren zu schlagen.
languages.original_text: Your words alone persuaded a group of rebels to join the Arbitrators' side in the midst of a planet-wide uprising, without any need for punitive measures.

traits.locale_text: Deine Worte allein haben einige Rebellen dazu bewogen, sich während eines planetenweiten Aufstandes ohne Strafmaßnahmen auf die Seite der Arbitratoren zu schlagen.

languages.text: Vos paroles ont suffi à persuader un groupe de rebelles de rallier la cause des arbitrators en plein soulèvement planétaire, sans qu'il soit nécessaire de recourir à des mesures punitives.
languages.original_text: Your words alone persuaded a group of rebels to join the Arbitrators' side in the midst of a planet-wide uprising, without any need for punitive measures.

traits.locale_text: Vos paroles ont suffi à persuader un groupe de rebelles de rallier la cause des arbitrators en plein soulèvement planétaire, sans qu'il soit nécessaire de recourir à des mesures punitives.

languages.text: 在某场席卷整颗行星的暴乱期间，你没有采取任何惩戒措施，仅仅通过一席演讲，就说服了一大群叛乱分子加入了法务官的队伍。
languages.original_text: Your words alone persuaded a group of rebels to join the Arbitrators' side in the midst of a planet-wide uprising, without any need for punitive measures.

traits.locale_text: 在某场席卷整颗行星的暴乱期间，你没有采取任何惩戒措施，仅仅通过一席演讲，就说服了一大群叛乱分子加入了法务官的队伍。

languages.text: Conseguiste convencer con tus palabras a un grupo de rebeldes para que se unieran a los Arbitrator en mitad de un levantamiento planetario, sin necesidad de medidas punitivas.
languages.original_text: Your words alone persuaded a group of rebels to join the Arbitrators' side in the midst of a planet-wide uprising, without any need for punitive measures.

traits.locale_text: Conseguiste convencer con tus palabras a un grupo de rebeldes para que se unieran a los Arbitrator en mitad de un levantamiento planetario, sin necesidad de medidas punitivas.

languages.text: 惑星規模の反乱の最中に、反逆者の一団をあなたの言葉だけで、処罰を加えることなくアービトレイター側に引き入れた。
languages.original_text: Your words alone persuaded a group of rebels to join the Arbitrators' side in the midst of a planet-wide uprising, without any need for punitive measures.

traits.locale_text: 惑星規模の反乱の最中に、反逆者の一団をあなたの言葉だけで、処罰を加えることなくアービトレイター側に引き入れた。

languages.text: Gezegen çapında bir ayaklanmanın ortasındaki bir isyancı topluluğunu cezalandırıcı önlemlere başvurma gereği duymadan, sırf sözlerinle Yargıcıların safına geçmeye ikna ettin.
languages.original_text: Your words alone persuaded a group of rebels to join the Arbitrators' side in the midst of a planet-wide uprising, without any need for punitive measures.

traits.locale_text: Gezegen çapında bir ayaklanmanın ortasındaki bir isyancı topluluğunu cezalandırıcı önlemlere başvurma gereği duymadan, sırf sözlerinle Yargıcıların safına geçmeye ikna ettin.
